sourcesContent:
import React ,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import {useLocation} from 'react-router-dom' import Axios from'axios' import '../Users/Users_home.css' import Users_Nav from './Users_Nav' function Users_Home() { const { state } = useLocation(); const [orgdetails,Setorgdetails] = useState("") useEffect(()=>{ const{id}= state; console.log(id) Axios.post("http://localhost:3001/api/orgdetails",{dash:id}).then((response)=>{ Setorgdetails(response.data) console.log(response.data) }) },[]) return ( <>

{orgdetails.org_name}

Organization Details:



Organiztion Name:
Status: PENDING
Organization ID: ORG_0001
Organization Contact: abckpk@org.pk
Organization Category ID: ORG_CAT_002
Organization type: Military
) } export default Users_Home
